xxl.core.xml.storage
Class MarkupNode

java.lang.Object
  xxl.core.xml.storage.Node
      xxl.core.xml.storage.MarkupNode
All Implemented Interfaces:
Cloneable
public class MarkupNode
extends Node

This class is an extention of the abstract class Node. It has the role of the XML-Tags as we know from XML documents. An markup node can have child nodes and can standalone (i.e. the root node of a document)
